attributes.action: Discuss openly the question of allowing the use of marijuana as a recreation drug, with an age limit on purchasing it and strict controls on its strength and additives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Petition is to bring in to question the positives and negatives of the use of marijuana (Weed) in a formal debate to discern if it has been rightly classified as an illegal drug (Class B or C). 

By signing this petition you agree to try and dispel the stigma surrounding the recreational use of marijuana by bringing the question to a public debate.

Please note: This is not a petition focused of the de-criminalisation of marijuana, just for a true, un-biased, fair debate of its legal status.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Nosilica/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
